verses.verse: Now the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> and the sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> had a very<WH3966> great<WH6099> multitude<WH7227> of cattle<WH4735>: and when they saw<WH7200> the land<WH776> of Jazer<WH3270>, and the land<WH776> of Gilead<WH1568>, that<WH4725>, behold, the place was a place<WH4725> for cattle<WH4735>;

The sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> came<WH935> and spoke<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, and to Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548>, and unto the princes<WH5387> of the congregation<WH5712>, saying<WH559>,
Ataroth<WH5852>, and Dibon<WH1769>, and Jazer<WH3270>, and Nimrah<WH5247>, and Heshbon<WH2809>, and Elealeh<WH500>, and Shebam<WH7643>, and Nebo<WH5015>, and Beon<WH1194>,

Even the country<WH776> which the Lord<WH3068> struck<WH5221> before<WH6440> the congregation<WH5712> of Israel<WH3478>, is a land<WH776> for cattle<WH4735>, and your servants<WH5650> have cattle<WH4735>:

Therefore<WH559>, said they<WH4672>, if we have found grace<WH2580> in your sight<WH5869>, let this land<WH776> be given<WH5414> unto your servants<WH5650> for a possession<WH272>, and bring us not over<WH5674> Jordan<WH3383>.
And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto the sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and to the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205>, Shall your brothers<WH251> go<WH935> to war<WH4421>, and shall you sit here<WH3427>?
And therefore discourage you<WH5106> the heart<WH3820> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> from going over<WH5674> into the land<WH776> which the Lord<WH3068> has given them<WH5414>?
Thus did<WH6213> your fathers<WH1>, when I sent<WH7971> them from Kadesh<WH6947>–barnea to see<WH7200> the land<WH776>.

For when they went up<WH5927> unto the valley<WH5158> of Eshcol<WH812>, and saw<WH7200> the land<WH776>, they discouraged<WH5106> the heart<WH3820> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, that they should not go<WH935> into the land<WH776> which the Lord<WH3068> had given them<WH5414>.
And the Lord<WH3068>'s anger<WH639> was kindled<WH2734> the same time<WH3117>, and he swore<WH7650>, saying<WH559>,

Surely<WH518> none of the men<WH582> that came up<WH5927> out of Egypt<WH4714>, from twenty<WH6242> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> and upward<WH4605>, shall see<WH7200> the land<WH127> which I swore<WH7650> unto Abraham<WH85>, unto Isaac<WH3327>, and unto Jacob<WH3290>; because they have not wholly<WH4390> followed me<WH310>:
Save Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> the Kenezite<WH7074>, and Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126>: for they have wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> the Lord<WH3068>.

And the Lord<WH3068>'s anger<WH639> was kindled<WH2734> against Israel<WH3478>, and he made them wander<WH5128> in the wilderness<WH4057> forty<WH705> years<WH8141>, until all the generation<WH1755>, that had done<WH6213> evil<WH7451> in the sight<WH5869> of the Lord<WH3068>, was consumed<WH8552>.

And<WH6965>, behold, you are risen up in your fathers<WH1>' stead<WH8635>, an increase of sinful<WH2400> men<WH582>, to augment<WH5595> yet the fierce<WH2740> anger<WH639> of the Lord<WH3068> toward Israel<WH3478>.
For if you turn away<WH7725> from after<WH310> him<WH3254>, he will yet again leave<WH3240> them in the wilderness<WH4057>; and you shall destroy<WH7843> all this people<WH5971>.
And they came near<WH5066> unto him<WH559>, and said, We will build<WH1129> sheepfolds<WH1448> here for our cattle<WH4735>, and cities<WH5892> for our little ones<WH2945>:

But we ourselves<WH587> will go ready<WH2363> armed<WH2502> before<WH6440> the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, until we have brought<WH935> them unto their place<WH4725>: and our little ones<WH2945> shall live<WH3427> in the fenced<WH4013> cities<WH5892> because<WH6440> of the inhabitants<WH3427> of the land<WH776>.
We will not return<WH7725> unto our houses<WH1004>, until the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> have inherited<WH5157> every man<WH376> his inheritance<WH5159>.

For we will not inherit<WH5157> with them on yonder side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383>, or forward<WH1973>; because our inheritance<WH5159> is fallen<WH935> to us on this side<WH5676> Jordan<WH3383> eastward<WH4217>.
And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto them<WH6213>, If you will do this thing<WH1697>, if you will go armed<WH2502> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> to war<WH4421>,
And will go<WH5674> all of you armed<WH2502> over<WH5674> Jordan<WH3383> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>, until he has driven out<WH3423> his enemies<WH341> from before him<WH6440>,

And the land<WH776> be subdued<WH3533> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>: then afterward<WH310> you shall return<WH7725>, and be guiltless<WH5355> before the Lord<WH3068>, and before Israel<WH3478>; and this land<WH776> shall be your possession<WH272> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>.
But if you will not do so<WH6213>, behold<WH2398>, you have sinned against the Lord<WH3068>: and be sure<WH3045> your sin<WH2403> will find you out<WH4672>.
Build<WH1129> you cities<WH5892> for your little ones<WH2945>, and folds<WH1448> for your sheep<WH6792>; and do<WH6213> that which has proceeded<WH3318> out of your mouth<WH6310>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> spoke<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>, Your servants<WH5650> will do<WH6213> as my lord<WH113> commanded<WH6680>.
Our little ones<WH2945>, our wives<WH802>, our flocks<WH4735>, and all our cattle<WH929>, shall be there in the cities<WH5892> of Gilead<WH1568>:
But your servants<WH5650> will pass over<WH5674>, every man armed<WH2502> for war<WH6635>, before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> to battle<WH4421>, as my lord<WH113> says<WH1696>.

So concerning them Moses<WH4872> commanded<WH6680> Eleazar<WH499> the priest<WH3548>, and Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126>, and the chief<WH7218> fathers<WH1> of the tribes<WH4294> of the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>:

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto them<WH1121>, If the sons of Gad<WH1410> and the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> will pass with you over<WH5674> Jordan<WH3383>, every man armed<WH2502> to battle<WH4421>, before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068>, and the land<WH776> shall be subdued<WH3533> before<WH6440> you<WH5414>; then you shall give them the land<WH776> of Gilead<WH1568> for a possession<WH272>:
But if they will not pass over<WH5674> with you armed<WH2502>, they shall have possessions<WH270> among<WH8432> you in the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> and the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> answered<WH6030>, saying<WH559>, As the Lord<WH3068> has said<WH1696> unto your servants<WH5650>, so will we do<WH6213>.

We will<WH5168> pass over<WH5674> armed<WH2502> before<WH6440> the Lord<WH3068> into the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>, that the possession<WH272> of our inheritance<WH5159> on this side<WH5676> Jordan may be ours<WH3383>.

And Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> unto them<WH1121>, even to the sons of Gad<WH1410>, and to the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205>, and unto half<WH2677> the tribe<WH7626> of Manasseh<WH4519> the son<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130>, the kingdom<WH4467> of Sihon<WH5511> king<WH4428> of the Amorites<WH567>, and the kingdom<WH4467> of Og<WH5747> king<WH4428> of Bashan<WH1316>, the land<WH776>, with the cities<WH5892> there in the coasts<WH1367>, even the cities<WH5892> of the country<WH776> round about<WH5439>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> built<WH1129> Dibon<WH1769>, and Ataroth<WH5852>, and Aroer<WH6177>,
And Atroth<WH5855>, Shophan, and Jaazer<WH3270>, and Jogbehah<WH3011>,
And Beth<WH1039>–nimrah, and Beth<WH1028>–haran, fenced<WH4013> cities<WH5892>: and folds<WH1448> for sheep<WH6629>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> built<WH1129> Heshbon<WH2809>, and Elealeh<WH500>, and Kirjathaim<WH7156>,
And Nebo<WH5015>, and Baal<WH1186>–meon, (their names<WH8034> being changed<WH4142>,) and Shibmah<WH7643>: and gave<WH7121> other names<WH8034> unto the cities<WH5892> which they built<WH1129>.
And the sons<WH1121> of Machir<WH4353> the son<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> went<WH3212> to Gilead<WH1568>, and took<WH3920> it<WH3423>, and dispossessed the Amorite which was in it<WH567>.
And Moses<WH4872> gave<WH5414> Gilead<WH1568> unto Machir<WH4353> the son<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519>; and he lived in it<WH3427>.
And Jair<WH2971> the son<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> went<WH1980> and took<WH3920> the small towns<WH2333> there<WH7121>, and called them Havoth<WH2334>–jair.
And Nobah<WH5025> went<WH1980> and took<WH3920> Kenath<WH7079>, and the villages<WH1323> there<WH7121>, and called it Nobah<WH5025>, after his own name<WH8034>.
